title: How do i talk directly to a riot member
body: How do i talk directly to a riot member? I have sent in a support ticket and posted on the boards

replies.body: Visit him/her at his/her doorstep. You can baseball bat as well since it will increase your negotiation ability.
thank you vary helpfull i won't do it but one way to go about it i guess

No, let's not do that please.  :P  If you are having an issue, then submitting a ticket is a solid path to take.  A response may be a bit depending on the size of the queue for the day, but we'll reply as soon as we can!
